Room.Name: Kista Amphitheater Grass Seating
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the grassy hill high up above the stage of the Amphitheater.
Room.LongDescription: The grass seating here was actually unintentional. This area was not developed, so when the Amphitheater became such a success, the regular seating was no longer sufficent and people began sitting up on the grass. Pretty soon, the grass seating area was permanently made a part of the Amphitheater. On some occasions, even all this space isn't enough. The stage area is north of here.
